meta.article_title: May 20, 2013 - Tools and Tactics for the Physically Challenged

physically-challenged-table-tennis-coach.probleme: Competing with a faster, stronger, and more athletic opponent

debutant.procedé: Use serves to set up your best shot and to set up other tools outlined below
Develop strong receive to take control of the rally

intermediaire.procedé: Use spin to mess up your opponent and slow down the pace
Keep the ball deep to jam your opponent and out-rally him

avance.procedé: Vary the pace and depth of shots to mess up an opponent's timing
Move the ball around to focus on three spots - wide backhand, wide forehand, and middle

exercices_complementaires.description: Practice mixing in short and long serves with extreme and varying spins.
Practice developing strong receive to take control of the rally.
Practice using both heavy topspin and heavy backspin to mess up an opponent.

erreurs_a_eviter.erreur: Trying to attack all your opponent's serves
Focusing on speed rather than control
